channel.title: Physics Issue?
channel.description: Greetings. Can someone explain why when I jump in moving rail wagon i'm stoping while the rail wagon keeps moving? This is just the begining of the game and it already breakes all laws of physics :frowning: This kills all wish to play :frowning:

item.title: Physics Issue?
item.dc:creator: Enclave
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

Probably not. Source uses licensed Havok physics, which I don’t think we have code access to. Even if we did, that stuff is extremely complicated anyway (hence why it’s licensed from a professional company who specifically deals with game physics), so I doubt we’d be able to do a better job. And regardless, it is a fairly minor issue, it only crops up 2 or 3 times throughout the course of the game.

Well. you right of course, i just thought that engines like Source can program speed of a player inside an object like “player speed + speed of object relative to outside world” Sorry for my bad English and thanks for explanations
